title: Rally Mechanic Sim
description:
Become an automotive sports mechanic in Rally Mechanic Simulator. Challenge your skills to the limit. Manage the garage, dealing with parts and funds. Fix damaged rally cars, tune them and go to rallies . Deal with bad weather and limited time. Conquer all of that and your competition. Become the mechanic of the best rally team out there. PATAPON 1+2 REPLAY
Your goal will be to handle time pressure and to turn a complete wreck into something that will drive and win a special stage. The entire teamâ€™s performance during the rally will depend on your decisions, mechanical prowess, time and budget management.
Get your tools ready Creativity and the right items and tools will allow you to conquer all obstacles. Always take them all with you. Windshield replacement? Not a problem. Bumper repair? Piece of cake
Your workshop is your kingdom Take advantage of your well- stocked workshop with useful tools for fixing cars. With success comes money and with it, you will be able to upgrade both the tools and parts of your cars. Tune your car or even change its appearance to make a stylish impact during the rally.
Forge your career While fixing and modifying cars will be the main part of your experience, there will be much more to do. Setting up the team, negotiating sponsor deals and other facets of team and career development are some of the features that set Rally Mechanic Simulator apart from other games in the genre .

system_requirements.Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 580 Series with 4GB VRAM
